channel.title: D Claw spec messed up

item.title: D Claw spec messed up
item.dc:creator: @b4k_2_lumby b4k 2 lumby
item.description:
@b4k_2_lumby wrote:

If I have full special with d claws and click the spec bar it stays highlighted but it uses the special then I have to relog and it shows I have 2 spec bars I click the spec and it waist the spec but doesnt do the spec on the d claws. Also if I use full spec with d claws it stays highlighted but specs then you cant spec again -.-and if i switch to another wep it still has full spec bar highlighted.

Delta base 317

if(i == 8002) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 13699; class8.anInt181 = 630; class8.anInt190 = 268; class8.anInt198 = 1340; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -7; class8.anInt194 = -13; class8.anInt165 = 13698; class8.anInt200 = 13698; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1;

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(20) + misc.random(10) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); dclaws = 3; }

Heres another one for npcs I guess

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }
